rules.name: Create Table Naming Convention
rules.description: CREATE TABLE should follow the pattern [dbo].[tblkProducts] or [dbo].[tblProducts] where the table name is PascalCase and prefixed with 'tblk' or 'tbl'.

rules.name: Database Name Convention
rules.description: MDC databases will follow this pattern for naming.

rules.name: Create Table Naming Convention v2
rules.description: CREATE TABLE should follow the pattern [dbo].[tblkProducts] or [dbo].[tblProducts] where the table name is PascalCase and prefixed with 'tblk' or 'tbl'.

rules.name: Column Naming Convention
rules.description: Passing examples are [FirstName] [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL, [Title] [nvarchar](30) NULL
